casebody.data:
CARILLON
v.
NCDHHS, et al. No. 54A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006.

Melissa L. Trippe, Mark A. Davis, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Thomas M.

*7Woodward, Susan K. Hackney, Assistant Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS. Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Forrest W. Campbell, Jr., Greensboro, Charles F. Marshall, III, Raleigh, for Carillon Assistant Living. Susan M. Fradenburg, Allyson Jones Labban, Greensboro, for Ridge Care, Inc. Colin R. Stockton, for MedCath Diagnostics, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of December 2006 by Respondent (NCDHHS) for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006."
